META_DESCRIPTION: Learn more about the roles of liquidity providers, policyholders, and cover creators in our decentralized insurance ecosystem.
META_OG_DESCRIPTION: Learn more about the roles of liquidity providers, policyholders, and cover creators in our decentralized insurance ecosystem.
META_TWITTER_DESCRIPTION: Learn more about the roles of liquidity providers, policyholders, and cover creators in our decentralized insurance ecosystem.
Neptune Mutual is designed to protect yo: Neptune Mutual is designed to protect your project from any potential hacking or security issues. Make sure your community is aware of the advantages of a parametric insurance model. Unlike other insurance products, policyholders do not need to request another user to confirm their proof of loss.
Supply stablecoin liquidity to receive r: Supply stablecoin liquidity to receive rewards and protect your favorite DeFi cover project
Supply liquidity to diversified DeFi cov: Supply liquidity to diversified DeFi cover pools to enhance capital efficiency
Donate reassurance fund to your DeFi cov: Donate reassurance fund to your DeFi cover pool to lower the premium fee for policyholders and help boost liquidity provider confidence.
Reward your DeFi policy purchasers and l: Reward your DeFi policy purchasers and liquidity providers by rewarding them with your tokens with us or directly. Demonstrate that you care.
Build a community around your DeFi cover: Build a community around your DeFi cover pool and crowdpool the liquidity required to get your DeFi project covered against possible incident
Build a community around your DeFi cover pool by first participating as liquidity provider. If you don’t, no one else will take risks on your behalf.
Be pragmatic. Create a dedicated cover p: Be pragmatic. Create a dedicated cover pool to offer your DeFi users the fastest claims resolution ever in the event of an incident.
A hack on another cover pool will not af: A hack on another cover pool will not affect your dedicated DeFi cover pool. The risks are segregated.
Democratize insurance community for your: Democratize insurance community for your decentralized app, exchange, or DeFi project
Resolve incidents much faster without ha: Resolve incidents much faster without having to undergo claims assessment process
The price fluctuation of NPM token will: The price fluctuation of NPM token will not affect your claims payout or the total available cover liquidity a DeFi project.
In Neptune Mutual, claim processing is: In Neptune Mutual,  claim processing is automatic. Say Goodbye to denied claims assessment.
Stay protected against exchange hacks &: Stay protected against exchange hacks & dApp, DeFi, and smart contract exploits.
Purchase policy from dedicated DeFi cove: Purchase policy from dedicated DeFi cover pool to get guaranteed payouts
Flash loans are capitalized to cover poo: Flash loans are capitalized to cover pools which proportionately distributes rewards to the POD holders
For taking risks, receive staking reward: For taking risks, receive staking rewards for your POD tokens offered by the covered DeFi projects
Grow your capital by vetting DeFi protoc: Grow your capital by vetting DeFi protocols and  policy premium income on the projects you trust the most
